# sonarqube_project_user (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "sonarqube_project_user" "my-project-user" {
  login       = "my-login"
  permissions = ["user"]
  project_key = "my-project-key"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `login` (String)
- `permissions` (List of String)
- `project_key` (String)

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
